===Etymology===
{{zh-psm|Deutsch|German|lang=de}}.

The tendency to use commendatory characters in country names was also seen in:
* {{zh-l|美國|America; ''lit.'' pretty country}},
* {{zh-l|英國|England; ''lit.'' flower/outstanding country}} and
* {{zh-l|法國|France, ''lit.'' the law country}}.
